Vice Principal: Miss Sharon Clarissa Lee Hui Chin
School Vision: Guided by strong values, students will take ownership of their learning and have the courage to change and adapt to the VUCA environment. With the emphasis on Social Emotional Learning (SEL) competencies, students will become lifelong learners through their self-awareness, self-management and social awareness.
School Mission: - Developing students who are rooted in values and morally upright.
- Nurturing staff and students to become self-directed learners and discover their passion for learning within a caring, safe, secure and supportive environment.
- Leading, caring and inspiring our students to be the best that they can be.
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: We are guided by our 3 beliefs - that 'Every Student Learns', 'Every Staff Cares' and 'Every Partner Supports'. The school places great emphasis on the wellbeing of our students, and our staff are dedicated to ensuring that students' needs are seen to so that they can learn the best way possible. Over the years, the school has forged strong partnerships with both internal and external stakeholders and these partnerships provide strong support for our students.

Through the holistic education offered at MPS, we hope that all staff and students who pass through the gates of MPS will live up to the school's motto of Nobility in Aspiration, Honorable in Character, Excellent in Spirit, and above all, Love.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government School / Co-ed School / Single Session

School Distinctive Programmes.Sports & Outdoor Education: Learn, Love, Lead through Sports (3L Sports)
